   19: 
   20: -module(escript_SUITE).
   21: -export([
   22: 	 all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 init_per_testcase/2,
   25: 	 end_per_testcase/2,
   26: 	 basic/1,
   27: 	 errors/1,
   28: 	 strange_name/1,
   29: 	 emulator_flags/1,
   30: 	 emulator_flags_no_shebang/1,
   31: 	 two_lines/1,
   32: 	 module_script/1,
   33: 	 beam_script/1,
   34: 	 archive_script/1,
   35: 	 archive_script_file_access/1,
   36: 	 epp/1,
   37: 	 create_and_extract/1,
   38: 	 foldl/1,
   39: 	 overflow/1,
   40: 	 verify_sections/4,
   41:          unicode/1,
   42:          bad_io_server/1
   43: 	]).
   44: 
   45: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   46: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   47: 
   48: suite() ->
   49:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   50:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   51: 
   52: all() -> 
   53:     [basic, errors, strange_name, emulator_flags,
   54:      emulator_flags_no_shebang, two_lines,
   55:      module_script, beam_script, archive_script, epp,
   56:      create_and_extract, foldl, overflow,
   57:      archive_script_file_access, unicode, bad_io_server].
   58: 
   59: groups() -> 
   60:     [].
   61: 
   62: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   69:     Config.
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   78:     ok.
   79: 
   80: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   81: 
   82: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   84:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
   85:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial 5",
   86: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
   87:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile 10",
   88: 	<<"factorial 10 = 3628800\nExitCode:0">>),
   89:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_compile_main 7",
   90: 	<<"factorial 7 = 5040\nExitCode:0">>),
   91:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_warning 20",
   92:         [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
   93:                     "%   12| bar() ->\n"
   94:                     "%     | ^\n\n"
   95:                     "factorial 20 = 2432902008176640000\n"
   96:                     "ExitCode:0">>]),
   97:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-i", "factorial_warning 20",
   98:                   [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
   99:                               "factorial 20 = 2432902008176640000\nExitCode:0">>]),
  100:     Warnings = [data_dir,<<"factorial_warning:12:1: Warning: function bar/0 is unused\n"
  101:                            "%   12| bar() ->\n"
  102:                            "%     | ^\n\n"
  103:                            "ExitCode:0">>],
  104:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  105:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s -i", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  106:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-c -s", "factorial_warning", Warnings),
  107:     run(Config, Dir, "filesize "++filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),"filesize"),
  108: 	[data_dir,<<"filesize:11:1: Warning: function id/1 is unused\n"
  109:                     "%   11| id(I) -> I.\n"
  110:                     "%     | ^\n"
  111:                     "\n"
  112:                     "324\n"
  113:                     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  114:     run(Config, Dir, "test_script_name",
  115: 	[data_dir,<<"test_script_name\nExitCode:0">>]),
  116:     run(Config, Dir, "tail_rec 1000",
  117: 	[<<"ok\nExitCode:0">>]),
  118: 
  119:     %% We expect the trap_exit flag for the process to be false,
  120:     %% since that is the default state for newly spawned processes.
  121:     run(Config, Dir, "trap_exit",
  122: 	<<"false\nExitCode:0">>),
  123:     ok.
  124: 
  125: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  126: 
  127: errors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  128:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  129:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  130:     run(Config, Dir, "compile_error",
  131: 	[data_dir,<<"compile_error:5:12: syntax error before: '*'\n">>,
  132: 	 data_dir,<<"compile_error:8:9: syntax error before: blarf\n">>,
  133: 	 <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  134:     CompileErrors = [data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n"
  135:                                 "%    6| main(Args) ->\n"
  136:                                 "%     | ^\n\n">>,
  137:                      data_dir,("lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n"
  138:                                "%    8|     halt(ExitCode).\n"
  139:                                "%     |          ^\n\n"),
  140:                      <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>],
  141:     run(Config, Dir, "lint_error", CompileErrors),
  142:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-i", "lint_error",
  143:                   [data_dir,<<"lint_error:6:1: function main/1 already defined\n">>,
  144:                    data_dir,"lint_error:8:10: variable 'ExitCode' is unbound\n",
  145:                    <<"escript: There were compilation errors.\nExitCode:127">>]),
  146:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "-s", "lint_error", CompileErrors),
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  150: 
  151: strange_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  153:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  154:     run(Config, Dir, "strange.name -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  155: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  156: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  160: 
  161: emulator_flags(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  162:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  163:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  164:     run(Config, Dir, "emulator_flags -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  165: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  166: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  167: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  168: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  169: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  170: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  171:     ok.
  172: 
  173: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  174: 
  175: two_lines(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  177:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  178:     run(Config, Dir, "two_lines -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  179: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  180: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  181: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  182: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  183:     ok.
  184: 
  185: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  186: 
  187: emulator_flags_no_shebang(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  188:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  189:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  190:     %% Need run_with_opts, to always use "escript" explicitly
  191:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", "emulator_flags_no_shebang -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  192: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  193: 		     "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  194: 		     "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  195: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  196: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  197: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  198:     ok.
  199: 
  200: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  201: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script
  202: %% Generate a new escript with a module header
  203: 
  204: module_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  205:     %% Read orig file
  206:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  207:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  208:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  209:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  210:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  211: 
  212:     %% Write source file
  213:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  214:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  215:     Base = "module_script",
  216:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  217:     ErlCode = ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  218: 	       "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  219: 	       string:join(Source, "\n"),
  220: 	       "\n"],
  221:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  222: 
  223: %%%%%%%
  224:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  225: 
  226:     %% With shebang
  227:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  228:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  229:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  230: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  231: 			  ErlCode]),
  232:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  233: 
  234:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  235: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  236: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  237: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  238: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  239: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  240: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  241: 
  242:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  243: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  244: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  245: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  246: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  247: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  248: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  249: 
  250:     %% Without shebang
  251:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  252:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  253:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  254: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  255: 			  ErlCode]),
  256:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  257: 
  258:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  259: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  260: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  261: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  262: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  263: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  264: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  265: 
  266:     %% Plain module without header
  267:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  268:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  269:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [ErlCode]),
  270:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  271: 
  272:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  273: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  274: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  275: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  276: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  277: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  278: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  279: 
  280: %%%%%%%
  281:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  282: 
  283:     %% With shebang
  284:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args_with_shebang",
  285:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  286:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  287: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  288: 			  Mode, "\n",
  289: 			  Flags, "\n",
  290: 			  ErlCode]),
  291:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  292: 
  293:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  294: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  295: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  296: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  297: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  298: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  299: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  300: 
  301:     ok.
  302: 
  303: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  304: %% Pick the source code from the emulator_flags script and compile it.
  305: %% Generate a new escript containing the beam code and the escript header
  306: beam_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  307:     %% Read orig file
  308:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  309:     OrigFile = filename:join([Data,"emulator_flags"]),
  310:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  311:     [Shebang, Mode, Flags | Source] = string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  312:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  313: 
  314:     %% Write source file
  315:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  316:     Dir = filename:absname(Priv), % Get rid of trailing slash.
  317:     Base = "beam_script",
  318:     ErlFile = filename:join([Priv, Base ++ ".erl"]),
  319:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile,
  320: 			 ["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  321: 			  "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  322: 			  string:join(Source, "\n"),
  323: 			  "\n"]),
  324: 
  325:     %% Compile the code
  326:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} = compile:file(ErlFile, [binary]),
  327: 
  328: %%%%%%%
  329:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  330: 
  331:     %% With shebang
  332:     NoArgsBase = Base ++ "_no_args_with_shebang",
  333:     NoArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase]),
  334:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile,
  335: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  336: 			  BeamCode]),
  337:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile, OrigFI),
  338: 
  339:     run(Config, Dir, NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  340: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  341: 	   "nostick:[]\n"
  342: 	   "mnesia:[]\n"
  343: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  344: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  345: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  346: 
  347:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  348: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  349: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  350: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  351: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  352: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  353: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  354: 
  355:     %% Without shebang
  356:     NoArgsBase2 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_shebang",
  357:     NoArgsFile2 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase2]),
  358:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile2,
  359: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  360: 			  BeamCode]),
  361:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile2, OrigFI),
  362: 
  363:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase2 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  364: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  365: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  366: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  367: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  368: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  369: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  370: 
  371:     %% Plain beam file without header
  372:     NoArgsBase3 = Base ++ "_no_args_without_header",
  373:     NoArgsFile3 = filename:join([Priv, NoArgsBase3]),
  374:     ok = file:write_file(NoArgsFile3, [BeamCode]),
  375:     ok = file:write_file_info(NoArgsFile3, OrigFI),
  376: 
  377:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", NoArgsBase3 ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  378: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  379: 		     "nostick:[]\n"
  380: 		     "mnesia:[]\n"
  381: 		     "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  382: 		     "unknown:[]\n"
  383: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  384: 
  385: %%%%%%%
  386:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  387: 
  388:     %% With shebang
  389:     ArgsBase = Base ++ "_args",
  390:     ArgsFile = filename:join([Priv, ArgsBase]),
  391:     ok = file:write_file(ArgsFile,
  392: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  393: 			  Mode, "\n",
  394: 			  Flags, "\n",
  395: 			  BeamCode]),
  396:     ok = file:write_file_info(ArgsFile, OrigFI),
  397: 
  398:     run(Config, Dir, ArgsBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  399: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  400: 	   "nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  401: 	   "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  402: 	   "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  403: 	   "unknown:[]\n"
  404: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  405:     ok.
  406: 
  407: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  408: %% Create an archive file containing two entire applications plus two
  409: %% alternate main modules. Generate a new escript containing the archive
  410: %% (with .app and .beam files and) and the escript header.
  411: 
  412: archive_script(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  413:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir
  414:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  415:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  416:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script.zip"]),
  417:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script"],
  418: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  419:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  420:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script"]),
  421: 
  422:     %% Compile the code
  423:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dict"),
  424:     ok = compile_app(TopDir, "archive_script_dummy"),
  425:     {ok, MainFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  426:     ok = compile_files(MainFiles, TopDir, TopDir),
  427: 
  428:     %% Create the archive
  429:     {ok, TopFiles} = file:list_dir(TopDir),
  430:     {ok, {_, ArchiveBin}} = zip:create(Archive, TopFiles,
  431: 				       [memory, {compress, []}, {cwd, TopDir}]),
  432: 
  433:     %% Read the source script
  434:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir, "emulator_flags"]),
  435:     {ok, OrigBin} = file:read_file(OrigFile),
  436:     [Shebang, Mode, _Flags | _Source] =
  437: 	string:tokens(binary_to_list(OrigBin), "\n"),
  438:     Flags = "%%! -archive_script_dict foo bar"
  439: 	" -archive_script_dict foo"
  440: 	" -archive_script_dummy bar",
  441:     {ok, OrigFI} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  442: 
  443: %%%%%%%
  444:     %% Create and run scripts without emulator flags
  445:     MainBase = "archive_script_main",
  446:     MainScript = filename:join([PrivDir, MainBase]),
  447: 
  448:     %% With shebang
  449:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  450: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  451: 			  Flags, "\n",
  452: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  453:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  454: 
  455:     run(Config, PrivDir, MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  456: 	[<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  457: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  458: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  459: 	   "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  460: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  461: 
  462:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  463: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  464: 		     "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  465: 		     "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  466: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  467: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  468: 
  469:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_with_shebang"),
  470: 
  471:     %% Without shebang (no flags)
  472:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript,
  473: 			 ["Something else than shebang!!!", "\n",
  474: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  475:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  476: 
  477:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  478: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  479: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  480: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  481: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  482: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  483:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_shebang"),
  484: 
  485:     %% Plain archive without header (no flags)
  486: 
  487:     ok = file:write_file(MainScript, [ArchiveBin]),
  488:     ok = file:write_file_info(MainScript, OrigFI),
  489: 
  490:     run_with_opts(Config, PrivDir, "", MainBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  491: 		  [<<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  492: 		     "dict:[]\n"
  493: 		     "dummy:[]\n"
  494: 		     "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  495: 		     "ExitCode:0">>]),
  496:     ok = file:rename(MainScript, MainScript ++ "_without_header"),
  497: 
  498: %%%%%%%
  499:     %% Create and run scripts with emulator flags
  500:     AltBase = "archive_script_alternate_main",
  501:     AltScript = filename:join([PrivDir, AltBase]),
  502:     ok = file:write_file(AltScript,
  503: 			 [Shebang, "\n",
  504: 			  Mode, "\n",
  505: 			  Flags, " -escript main archive_script_main2\n",
  506: 			  ArchiveBin]),
  507:     ok = file:write_file_info(AltScript, OrigFI),
  508: 
  509:     run(Config, PrivDir, AltBase ++  " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  510: 	[<<"main2:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n"
  511: 	   "dict:[{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\",\"bar\"]},{archive_script_dict,[\"foo\"]}]\n"
  512: 	   "dummy:[{archive_script_dummy,[\"bar\"]}]\n"
  513: 	   "priv:{ok,<<\"Some private data...\\n\">>}\n"
  514: 	   "ExitCode:0">>]),
  515: 
  516:     ok.
  517: 
  518: %% Test the correction of OTP-10071
  519: %% The errors identified are
  520: %%
  521: %% a) If primary archive was named "xxx", then a file in the same
  522: %%    directory named "xxxyyy" would be interpreted as a file named yyy
  523: %%    inside the archive.
  524: %%
  525: %% b) erl_prim_loader did not correctly create and normalize absolute
  526: %%    paths for primary archive and files inside it, so unless given
  527: %%    with exact same path files inside the archive would not be
  528: %%    found. E.g. if escript was started as ./xxx then "xxx/file"
  529: %%    would not be found since erl_prim_loader would try to match
  530: %%    /full/path/to/xxx with /full/path/to/./xxx. Same problem with
  531: %%    ../. Also, the use of symlinks in the path to the archive would
  532: %%    cause problems.
  533: %%
  534: %% c) Depending on how the primary archive was built,
  535: %%    erl_prim_loader:list_dir/1 would sometimes return an empty string
  536: %%    inside the file list. This was a virtual element representing the
  537: %%    top directory of the archive. This shall not occur.
  538: %%
  539: archive_script_file_access(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  540:     %% Copy the orig files to priv_dir
  541:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  542:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  543: 
  544:     MainMod = "archive_script_file_access",
  545:     MainSrc = MainMod ++ ".erl",
  546:     MainBeam = MainMod ++ ".beam",
  547: 
  548:     Archive = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script_file_access.zip"]),
  549:     {ok, _} = zip:create(Archive, ["archive_script_file_access"],
  550: 			 [{compress, []}, {cwd, DataDir}]),
  551:     {ok, _} = zip:extract(Archive, [{cwd, PrivDir}]),
  552:     TopDir = filename:join([PrivDir, "archive_script_file_access"]),
  553: 
  554:     %% Compile the code
  555:     ok = compile_files([MainSrc], TopDir, TopDir),
  556: 
  557:     %% First, create a file structure which will be included in the archive:
  558:     %%
  559:     %% dir1/
  560:     %% dir1/subdir1/
  561:     %% dir1/subdir1/file1
  562:     %%
  563:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
  564:     ok = file:set_cwd(TopDir),
  565:     DummyDir = "dir1",
  566:     DummySubDir = filename:join(DummyDir, "subdir1"),
  567:     RelDummyFile = filename:join(DummySubDir, "file1"),
  568:     DummyFile = filename:join(TopDir,RelDummyFile),
  569:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(DummyFile),
  570:     ok = file:write_file(DummyFile, ["foo\nbar\nbaz"]),
  571: 
  572:     %% 1. Create zip archive by adding the dummy file and the beam
  573:     %%    file as binaries to zip.
  574:     %%
  575:     %% This used to provoke the following issues when the script was run as
  576:     %% "./<script_name>":
  577:     %% a. erl_prim_loader:read_file_info/1 returning 'error'
  578:     %% b. erl_prim_loader:list_dir/1 returning {ok, ["dir1", [], "file1"]}
  579:     %%    leading to an infinite loop in reltool_target:spec_dir/1
  580:     Files1 =
  581: 	lists:map(fun(Filename) ->
  582: 			  {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(Filename),
  583: 			  {Filename,Bin}
  584: 		  end,
  585: 		  [RelDummyFile,MainBeam]),
  586:     {ok, {"mem", Bin1}} = zip:create("mem", Files1, [memory]),
  587: 
  588:     %% Create the escript
  589:     ScriptName1 = "archive_script_file_access1",
  590:     Script1 = filename:join([PrivDir, ScriptName1]),
  591:     Flags = "-escript main " ++ MainMod,
  592:     ok = escript:create(Script1,[shebang,{emu_args,Flags},{archive,Bin1}]),
  593:     ok = file:change_mode(Script1,8#00744),
  594: 
  595:     %% If supported, create a symlink to the script. This is used to
  596:     %% test error b) described above this test case.
  597:     SymlinkName1 = "symlink_to_"++ScriptName1,
  598:     Symlink1 = filename:join([PrivDir, SymlinkName1]),
  599:     file:make_symlink(ScriptName1,Symlink1), % will fail if not supported
  600: 
  601:     %% Also add a dummy file in the same directory with the same name
  602:     %% as the script except is also has an extension. This used to
  603:     %% test error a) described above this test case.
  604:     ok = file:write_file(Script1 ++ ".extension",
  605: 			 <<"same name as script, but with extension">>),
  606: 
  607:     %% Change to script's directory and run it as "./<script_name>"
  608:     ok = file:set_cwd(PrivDir),
  609:     run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ ScriptName1 ++ " " ++ ScriptName1,
  610: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  611:     ok = file:set_cwd(TopDir),
  612: 
  613: 
  614:     %% 2. Create zip archive by letting zip read the files from the file system
  615:     %%
  616:     %% The difference compared to the archive_script_file_access1 is
  617:     %% that this will have a file element for each directory in the
  618:     %% archive - while archive_script_file_access1 will only have a
  619:     %% file element per regular file.
  620:     Files2 = [DummyDir,MainBeam],
  621:     {ok, {"mem", Bin2}} = zip:create("mem", Files2, [memory]),
  622: 
  623:     %% Create the escript
  624:     ScriptName2 = "archive_script_file_access2",
  625:     Script2 = filename:join([PrivDir, ScriptName2]),
  626:     ok = escript:create(Script2,[shebang,{emu_args,Flags},{archive,Bin2}]),
  627:     ok = file:change_mode(Script2,8#00744),
  628: 
  629:     %% Also add a dummy file in the same directory with the same name
  630:     %% as the script except is also has an extension. This used to
  631:     %% test error a) described above this test case.
  632:     ok = file:write_file(Script2 ++ ".extension",
  633: 			 <<"same name as script, but with extension">>),
  634: 
  635:     %% If supported, create a symlink to the script. This is used to
  636:     %% test error b) described above this test case.
  637:     SymlinkName2 = "symlink_to_"++ScriptName2,
  638:     Symlink2 = filename:join([PrivDir, SymlinkName2]),
  639:     file:make_symlink(ScriptName2,Symlink2), % will fail if not supported
  640: 
  641:     %% Change to script's directory and run it as "./<script_name>"
  642:     ok = file:set_cwd(PrivDir),
  643:     run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ ScriptName2 ++ " " ++ ScriptName2,
  644: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  645: 
  646:     %% 3. If symlinks are supported, run one of the scripts via a symlink.
  647:     %%
  648:     %% This is in order to test error b) described above this test case.
  649:     case element(1,os:type()) =:= win32 orelse file:read_link(Symlink2) of
  650: 	{ok,_} ->
  651: 	    run(Config, PrivDir, "./" ++ SymlinkName2 ++ " " ++ ScriptName2,
  652: 		[<<"ExitCode:0">>]);
  653: 	_ -> % not supported
  654: 	    ok
  655:     end,
  656:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir).
  657: 
  658: 
  659: compile_app(TopDir, AppName) ->
  660:     AppDir = filename:join([TopDir, AppName]),
  661:     SrcDir = filename:join([AppDir, "src"]),
  662:     OutDir = filename:join([AppDir, "ebin"]),
  663:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(SrcDir),
  664:     compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir).
  665: 
  666: compile_files([File | Files], SrcDir, OutDir) ->
  667:     case filename:extension(File) of
  668: 	".erl" ->
  669: 	    AbsFile = filename:join([SrcDir, File]),
  670: 	    case compile:file(AbsFile, [{outdir, OutDir},report_errors]) of
  671: 		{ok, _Mod} ->
  672: 		    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir);
  673: 		Error ->
  674: 		    {compilation_error, AbsFile, OutDir, Error}
  675: 	    end;
  676: 	_ ->
  677: 	    compile_files(Files, SrcDir, OutDir)
  678:     end;
  679: compile_files([], _, _) ->
  680:     ok.
  681: 
  682: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  683: 
  684: epp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  685:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  686:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  687:     run(Config, Dir, "factorial_epp 5",
  688: 	<<"factorial 5 = 120\nExitCode:0">>),
  689:     ok.
  690: 
  691: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  692: 
  693: create_and_extract(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  694:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  695:      EmuArg, Source,
  696:      _ErlBase, ErlCode,
  697:      _BeamBase, BeamCode,
  698:      ArchiveBin} =
  699: 	prepare_creation("create_and_extract", Config),
  700: 
  701:     Bodies =
  702: 	[[{source, ErlCode}],
  703: 	 [{beam, BeamCode}],
  704: 	 [{archive, ArchiveBin}]],
  705: 
  706:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts with shebangs
  707:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  708: 	S <- [[{shebang, default}],
  709: 	      [{shebang, "/usr/bin/env     escript"}]],
  710: 	C <- [[],
  711: 	      [{comment, undefined}],
  712: 	      [{comment, default}],
  713: 	      [{comment, "This is a nonsense comment"}]],
  714: 	E <- [[],
  715: 	      [{emu_args, undefined}],
  716: 	      [{emu_args, EmuArg}]],
  717: 	B <- [[{source, Source}] | Bodies]],
  718: 
  719:     %% Verify all combinations of scripts without shebangs
  720:     [verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo, S ++ C ++ E ++ B) ||
  721: 	S <- [[], [{shebang, undefined}]],
  722: 	C <- [[], [{comment, undefined}]],
  723: 	E <- [[], [{emu_args, undefined}]],
  724: 	B <- Bodies],
  725: 
  726:     %% Verify the compile_source option
  727:     file:delete(NewFile),
  728:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{source, Source}]),
  729:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, Source}]} = escript:extract(NewFile, []),
  730:     {ok, [_, _, _, {source, BeamCode2}]} =
  731: 	escript:extract(NewFile, [compile_source]),
  732:     verify_sections(Config, NewFile, FileInfo,
  733: 		    [{shebang, default},
  734: 		     {comment, default},
  735: 		     {beam, BeamCode2}]),
  736: 
  737:     file:delete(NewFile),
  738:     ok.
  739: 
  740: prepare_creation(Base, Config) ->
  741:     %% Read the source
  742:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  743:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  744:     OrigFile = filename:join([DataDir,"emulator_flags"]),
  745:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(OrigFile),
  746:     NewFile = filename:join([PrivDir, Base]),
  747:     {ok, [{shebang, default},
  748: 	  {comment, _},
  749: 	  {emu_args, EmuArg},
  750: 	  {source, Source}]} =
  751: 	escript:extract(OrigFile, []),
  752: 
  753:     %% Compile the code
  754:     ErlFile = NewFile ++ ".erl",
  755:     ErlCode = list_to_binary(["\n-module(", Base, ").\n",
  756: 			      "-export([main/1]).\n\n",
  757: 			      Source, "\n\n"]),
  758:     ok = file:write_file(ErlFile, ErlCode),
  759: 
  760:     %% Compile the code
  761:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} =
  762: 	compile:file(ErlFile, [binary, debug_info]),
  763: 
  764:     %% Create an archive
  765:     {ok, {_, ArchiveBin}} =
  766: 	zip:create("dummy_archive_name",
  767: 		   [{Base ++ ".erl", ErlCode},
  768: 		    {Base ++ ".beam", BeamCode}],
  769: 		   [{compress, []}, memory]),
  770:     {NewFile, FileInfo,
  771:      EmuArg, Source,
  772:      Base ++ ".erl", ErlCode,
  773:      Base ++ ".beam", BeamCode,
  774:      ArchiveBin}.
  775: 
  776: verify_sections(Config, File, FileInfo, Sections) ->
  777:     io:format("~p:verify_sections(\n\t~p,\n\t~p,\n\t~p).\n",
  778: 	      [?MODULE, File, FileInfo, Sections]),
  779: 
  780:     %% Create
  781:     file:delete(File),
  782:     ok = escript:create(File, Sections),
  783:     ok = file:write_file_info(File, FileInfo),
  784: 
  785:     %% Run
  786:     Dir = filename:absname(filename:dirname(File)),
  787:     Base = filename:basename(File),
  788: 
  789:     HasArg = fun(Tag) ->
  790: 		     case lists:keysearch(Tag, 1, Sections) of
  791: 			 false -> false;
  792: 			 {value, {_, undefined}} -> false;
  793: 			 {value, _} -> true
  794: 		     end
  795: 	     end,
  796:     ExpectedMain = <<"main:[\"-arg1\",\"arg2\",\"arg3\"]\n">>,
  797:     ExpectedOutput =
  798: 	case HasArg(emu_args) of
  799: 	    true ->
  800: 		<<"nostick:[{nostick,[]}]\n"
  801: 		  "mnesia:[{mnesia,[\"dir\",\"a/directory\"]},{mnesia,[\"debug\",\"verbose\"]}]\n"
  802: 		  "ERL_FLAGS=false\n"
  803: 		  "unknown:[]\n"
  804: 		  "ExitCode:0">>;
  805: 	    false ->
  806: 		<<"nostick:[]\nmnesia:[]\nERL_FLAGS=false\nunknown:[]\nExitCode:0">>
  807: 	end,
  808: 
  809:     InputArgs = Base ++ " -arg1 arg2 arg3",
  810:     Expected = <<ExpectedMain/binary, ExpectedOutput/binary>>,
  811:     case HasArg(shebang) of
  812: 	true ->
  813: 	    run(Config, Dir, InputArgs, [Expected]);
  814: 	false ->
  815: 	    run_with_opts(Config, Dir, [], InputArgs, [Expected])
  816:     end,
  817: 
  818:     %% Verify
  819:     {ok, Bin} = escript:create(binary, Sections),
  820:     {ok, Read} = file:read_file(File),
  821:     Bin = Read, % Assert
  822: 
  823:     Normalized = normalize_sections(Sections),
  824:     {ok, Extracted} = escript:extract(File, []),
  825:     io:format("Normalized; ~p\n", [Normalized]),
  826:     io:format("Extracted ; ~p\n", [Extracted]),
  827:     Normalized = Extracted, % Assert
  828:     ok.
  829: 
  830: normalize_sections(Sections) ->
  831:     AtomToTuple =
  832: 	fun(Val) ->
  833: 		if
  834: 		    is_atom(Val) -> {Val, default};
  835: 		    true -> Val
  836: 		end
  837: 	end,
  838:     case lists:map(AtomToTuple, [{K, V} || {K, V} <- Sections, V =/= undefined]) of
  839: 	[{shebang, Shebang} | Rest] ->
  840: 	    [{shebang, Shebang} |
  841: 	     case Rest of
  842: 		 [{comment, Comment} | Rest2] ->
  843: 		     [{comment, Comment} |
  844: 		      case Rest2 of
  845: 			  [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body] ->
  846: 			      [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body];
  847: 			  [Body] ->
  848: 			      [{emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  849: 		      end
  850: 		     ];
  851: 		 [{emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body] ->
  852: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, EmuArgs}, Body];
  853: 		 [Body] ->
  854: 		     [{comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  855: 	     end
  856: 	    ];
  857: 	[Body] ->
  858: 	    [{shebang, undefined}, {comment, undefined}, {emu_args, undefined}, Body]
  859:     end.
  860: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  861: 
  862: 
  863: 
  864: foldl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  865:     {NewFile, _FileInfo,
  866:      _EmuArg, _Source,
  867:      ErlBase, ErlCode,
  868:      BeamBase, _BeamCode,
  869:      ArchiveBin} =
  870: 	prepare_creation("foldl", Config),
  871: 
  872:     Collect = fun(Name, GetInfo, GetBin, Acc) ->
  873: 		      [{Name, GetInfo(), GetBin()} | Acc]
  874: 	      end,
  875: 
  876:     %% Get line numbers and the file attribute right
  877:     SourceFile = NewFile ++ ".erl",
  878:     <<_:1/binary, ErlCode2/binary>> = ErlCode,
  879:     ok = file:write_file(SourceFile, ErlCode2),
  880:     {ok, _Mod, BeamCode} =
  881: 	compile:file(SourceFile, [binary, debug_info]),
  882: 
  883:     %% Verify source script
  884:     ok = escript:create(SourceFile, [{source, ErlCode}]),
  885:     {ok, [{".", _, BeamCode2}]}
  886: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], SourceFile),
  887: 
  888:     {ok, Abstr} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCode, [abstract_code]),
  889:     {ok, Abstr2} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCode2, [abstract_code]),
  890:     %% io:format("abstr1=~p\n", [Abstr]),
  891:     %% io:format("abstr2=~p\n", [Abstr2]),
  892:     Abstr = Abstr2, % Assert
  893: 
  894:     %% Verify beam script
  895:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{beam, BeamCode}]),
  896:     {ok, [{".", _, BeamCode}]}
  897: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  898: 
  899:     %% Verify archive scripts
  900:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{archive, ArchiveBin}]),
  901:     {ok, [{BeamBase, #file_info{}, _},
  902: 	  {ErlBase, #file_info{}, _}]}
  903: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  904: 
  905:     ArchiveFiles = [{ErlBase, ErlCode}, {BeamBase, BeamCode}],
  906:     ok = escript:create(NewFile, [{archive, ArchiveFiles, []}]),
  907:     {ok, [{BeamBase, _, _},
  908: 	  {ErlBase, _, _}]}
  909: 	= escript_foldl(Collect, [], NewFile),
  910: 
  911:     ok.
  912: 
  913: escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  914:     code:ensure_loaded(zip),
  915:     case erlang:function_exported(zip, foldl, 3) of
  916: 	true ->
  917: 	    emulate_escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File);
  918: 	false ->
  919: 	    escript:foldl(Fun, Acc, File)
  920:     end.
  921: 
  922: emulate_escript_foldl(Fun, Acc, File) ->
  923:     case escript:extract(File, [compile_source]) of
  924: 	{ok, [_Shebang, _Comment, _EmuArgs, Body]} ->
  925: 	    case Body of
  926: 		{source, BeamCode} ->
  927: 		    GetInfo = fun() -> file:read_file_info(File) end,
  928: 		    GetBin = fun() -> BeamCode end,
  929: 		    {ok, Fun(".", GetInfo, GetBin, Acc)};
  930: 		{beam, BeamCode} ->
  931: 		    GetInfo = fun() -> file:read_file_info(File) end,
  932: 		    GetBin = fun() -> BeamCode end,
  933: 		    {ok, Fun(".", GetInfo, GetBin, Acc)};
  934: 		{archive, ArchiveBin} ->
  935: 		    zip:foldl(Fun, Acc, {File, ArchiveBin})
  936: 	    end;
  937: 	{error, Reason} ->
  938: 	    {error, Reason}
  939:     end.
  940: 
  941: unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  942:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  943:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  944:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode1",
  945:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  946:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  947:            "called as <<224,170,170>> / <<224,170,170>>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  948:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode2",
  949:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  950:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  951:            "called as <<\"\xaa\">> / <<\"\xaa\">>\nExitCode:127">>]),
  952:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode3", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  953:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode4", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  954:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode5", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  955:     run(Config, Dir, "unicode6", [<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  956:     ok.
  957: 
  958: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  959: 
  960: overflow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  961:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  962:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  963:     run(Config, Dir, "arg_overflow",
  964: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  965:     run(Config, Dir, "linebuf_overflow",
  966: 	[<<"ExitCode:0">>]),
  967:     ok.
  968: 
  969: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  970: 
  971: %% OTP-16006, ERL-992
  972: bad_io_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  973:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  974:     Dir = filename:absname(Data),		%Get rid of trailing slash.
  975:     run(Config, Dir, "bad_io_server",
  976:         [<<"escript: exception error: an error occurred when evaluating"
  977:            " an arithmetic expression\n  in operator  '/'/2\n     "
  978:            "called as '\\x{400}' / 0\nExitCode:127">>]),
  979:     ok.
  980: 
  981: run(Config, Dir, Cmd, Expected) ->
  982:     run_with_opts(Config, Dir, "", Cmd, Expected).
  983: 
  984: run_with_opts(Config, Dir, Opts, Cmd0, Expected) ->
  985:     [CmdName | _] = string:split(Cmd0, " ", all),
  986:     Cmd = case os:type() of
  987: 	      {win32,Wtype} ->
  988:                   %% This case is stolen from os:mk_cmd/2
  989:                   Command = case {os:getenv("COMSPEC"),Wtype} of
  990:                                 {false,windows} -> "command.com /c ";
  991:                                 {false,_} -> "cmd /c ";
  992:                                 {Cspec,_} -> lists:concat([Cspec," /c "])
  993:                             end,
  994:                   Command ++ "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ filename:nativename(Dir) ++ "\\" ++ Cmd0;
  995: 	      _ -> "escript " ++ Opts ++ " " ++ Dir ++ "/" ++ Cmd0
  996: 	  end,
  997:     do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd, Expected).
  998: 
  999: do_run(Config, CmdName, Dir, Cmd0, Expected0) ->
 1000:     StdErrFile = tempnam(Config, CmdName),
 1001:     Cmd = Cmd0 ++ " 2> " ++ filename:nativename(StdErrFile),
 1002:     io:format("Run: ~p\n", [Cmd]),
 1003:     Expected = iolist_to_binary(expected_output(Expected0, Dir)),
 1004: 
 1005:     Env = [{"PATH",Dir++":"++os:getenv("PATH")},
 1006:            {"ERL_FLAGS",false},{"ERL_AFLAGS",false}],
 1007:     Port = open_port({spawn,Cmd}, [exit_status,eof,in,{env,Env},hide]),
 1008:     StdOut = get_data(Port, []),
 1009:     receive
 1010: 	{Port,{exit_status,ExitCode}} ->
 1011: 	    {ok, StdErr} = file:read_file(StdErrFile),
 1012: 	    file:delete(StdErrFile),
 1013: 	    Res = [StdErr, StdOut],
 1014: 	    Actual = iolist_to_binary([Res,"ExitCode:"++integer_to_list(ExitCode)]),
 1015: 	    case matches(Expected, Actual) of
 1016: 		true ->
 1017: 		    ok;
 1018: 		false ->
 1019: 		    io:format("Expected: ~p\n", [Expected]),
 1020: 		    io:format("Actual:   ~p\n", [Actual]),
 1021: 		    ct:fail(failed)
 1022: 	    end
 1023:     end.
 1024: 
 1025: %% Check if Expected and Actual contain the same lines.
 1026: %% The lines may occur in different order.
 1027: matches(Expected, Actual) ->
 1028:     ExpectedLines = string:split(Expected, "\n", all),
 1029:     ActualLines = string:split(Actual, "\n", all),
 1030:     matches_1(ExpectedLines, ActualLines).
 1031: 
 1032: matches_1([], []) -> true;
 1033: matches_1([Line | Expected], Actual0) ->
 1034:     case delete_first(Line, Actual0) of
 1035: 	false -> false;
 1036: 	Actual -> matches_1(Expected, Actual)
 1037:     end.
 1038: 
 1039: delete_first(X, L) -> delete_first(X, L, []).
 1040: 
 1041: delete_first(_X, [], _Acc) -> false;
 1042: delete_first(X, [X | Tail], Acc) -> lists:reverse(Acc, Tail);
 1043: delete_first(X, [Y | Tail], Acc) -> delete_first(X, Tail, [Y | Acc]).
 1044: 
 1045: tempnam(Config, Prefix) ->
 1046:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1047:     File = filename:join(Dir, Prefix ++ ".stderr"),
 1048:     case file:delete(File) of
 1049: 	ok -> ok;
 1050: 	{error, enoent} -> ok
 1051:     end,
 1052:     case file:open(File, [write, exclusive, raw]) of
 1053: 	{ok, IoDev} ->
 1054: 	    ok = file:close(IoDev),
 1055: 	    ok = file:delete(File),
 1056: 	    File;
 1057: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1058: 	    io:format("Failed to create ~s: ~p\n", [File, Reason]),
 1059: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 1060:     end.
 1061: 
 1062: get_data(Port, SoFar) ->
 1063:     receive
 1064: 	{Port,{data,Bytes}} ->
 1065: 	    get_data(Port, [SoFar|Bytes]);
 1066: 	{Port,eof} ->
 1067: 	    erlang:port_close(Port),
 1068: 	    SoFar
 1069:     end.
 1070: 
 1071: expected_output([data_dir|T], Data) ->
 1072:     Slash = case os:type() of
 1073: 		{win32,_} -> "\\";
 1074: 		_ -> "/"
 1075: 	    end,
 1076:     [filename:nativename(Data)++Slash|expected_output(T, Data)];
 1077: expected_output([H|T], Data) ->
 1078:     [H|expected_output(T, Data)];
 1079: expected_output([], _) ->
 1080:     [];
 1081: expected_output(Bin, _) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1082:     Bin.
 1083:
